properties.entry: SELECT P.ORDER_NO ,ORDER_NAME ,ORDER_NO ,ORDER_DATE ,P.PNO ,TITLE ,ORDER_STATUS ,TOTAL_PRICE ,PAY_PRICE ,PAY_OPT ,MEM_ID FROM "ORDER_P" P JOIN "ORDER" O ON (O.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT ON (PRODUCT.PNO = P.PNO) JOIN PAY ON (PAY.ORDER_NO = P.ORDER_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (O.MEM_NO = MEMBER.MEM_NO) WHERE P.ORDER_STATUS = 'C' OR P.ORDER_STATUS = 'CC' OR P.ORDER_STATUS = 'N' AND O.ORDER_DATE BETWEEN ? AND ? ORDER BY ORDER_DATE DESC
